summary: A scientific observer's job of observing an old cantankerous single man's kitchen habits is complicated by his growing friendship with him.
cast: Joachim Calmeyer|Tomas Norström|Bjørn Floberg|Reine Brynolfsson|Sverre Anker Ousdal|Leif Andrée|Gard B. Eidsvold|Lennart Jähkel|Trond Brænne|Bjørn Jenseg|Jan Gunnar Røise|Karin Lunden|Päivi Laakso
title: Salmer fra kjøkkenet
